column1: A funeral service for Thelma Wiltse will be held 10:30 a.m. Tuesday
column3: 2015 at Messiah Lutheran Church in Charles City.  Pastor Jane Keel will officiate.  Burial will be at the New Hampton Cemetery at 2:00 p.m. in New Hampton. Friends may call at the Hauser Funeral Home from 5 to 7:00 p.m. Monday
column5: 2015 and one hour prior to the funeral service Tuesday at the church.
